mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT SUPR_ID, SUPR_NAME, RPRS_NAME, BIZR_NUM, CASE WHEN SUM(ORDER_AMT) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE SUM(ORDER_AMT) END AS ORDER_AMT, CASE WHEN SUM(RFND_AMT) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE SUM(RFND_AMT) END AS RFND_AMT FROM ( SELECT A.SUPR_ID, B.SUPR_NAME, B.RPRS_NAME, B.BIZR_NUM, TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DTM, A.ORDER_AMT, A.RFND_AMT FROM POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXD A, POLARBEAR.TB_SPINFOXM B WHERE A.SUPR_ID = B.SUPR_ID GROUP BY A.REG_DTM, A.SUPR_ID, B.SUPR_NAME,B.RPRS_NAME, B.BIZR_NUM, A.ORDER_AMT,A.RFND_AMT ) GROUP BY SUPR_ID, SUPR_NAME, RPRS_NAME, BIZR_NUM ORDER BY SUPR_NAME ASC )

SELECT SUPR_ID, SUPR_NAME, RPRS_NAME, BIZR_NUM, CASE WHEN SUM(ORDER_AMT) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE SUM(ORDER_AMT) END AS ORDER_AMT, CASE WHEN SUM(RFND_AMT) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE SUM(RFND_AMT) END AS RFND_AMT FROM ( SELECT A.SUPR_ID, B.SUPR_NAME, B.RPRS_NAME, B.BIZR_NUM, TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DTM, A.ORDER_AMT, A.RFND_AMT FROM POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXD A, POLARBEAR.TB_SPINFOXM B WHERE A.SUPR_ID = B.SUPR_ID
GROUP BY A.REG_DTM, A.SUPR_ID, B.SUPR_NAME,B.RPRS_NAME, B.BIZR_NUM, A.ORDER_AMT,A.RFND_AMT ) GROUP BY SUPR_ID, SUPR_NAME, RPRS_NAME, BIZR_NUM ORDER BY SUPR_NAME ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT A.ORDER_NUM , TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DTM , A.PD_CODE , POLARBEAR.FC_GET_ORDER_PD_NM(A.ORDER_NUM, A.PD_CODE, A.ORDER_DTNUM) AS PD_NAME , A.ORDER_AMT , A.RFND_AMT FROM POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXD A WHERE A.SUPR_ID =#{SUPR_ID}
)

SELECT A.ORDER_NUM , TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DTM , A.PD_CODE , POLARBEAR.FC_GET_ORDER_PD_NM(A.ORDER_NUM, A.PD_CODE, A.ORDER_DTNUM) AS PD_NAME , A.ORDER_AMT , A.RFND_AMT FROM POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXD A WHERE A.SUPR_ID =#{SUPR_ID}
ORDER BY ORDER_NUM DESC

SELECT SUPR_ID, SUPR_NAME, RPRS_NAME, BIZR_NUM, CASE WHEN SUM(ORDER_AMT) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE SUM(ORDER_AMT) END AS ORDER_AMT, CASE WHEN SUM(RFND_AMT) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE SUM(RFND_AMT) END AS RFND_AMT, CASE WHEN SUM(REAL_AMT) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE SUM(REAL_AMT) END AS REAL_AMT FROM ( SELECT A.SUPR_ID, B.SUPR_NAME, B.RPRS_NAME, B.BIZR_NUM, TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DTM, A.ORDER_AMT, A.RFND_AMT, A.ORDER_AMT - A.RFND_AMT AS REAL_AMT FROM POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXD A, POLARBEAR.TB_SPINFOXM B WHERE A.SUPR_ID = B.SUPR_ID
AND A.SUPR_ID IN
#{item}
GROUP BY A.REG_DTM, A.SUPR_ID, B.SUPR_NAME,B.RPRS_NAME, B.BIZR_NUM, A.ORDER_AMT,A.RFND_AMT ) GROUP BY SUPR_ID, SUPR_NAME, RPRS_NAME, BIZR_NUM ORDER BY SUPR_NAME ASC
